bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
Currently the following unit tests are failing: RecordReaderDataSetIteratorTest
testVariableLengthSequence testSequenceRecordReaderSingleReader testSequenceRecordReader
RecordReaderMultiDataSetIteratorTest
testBasic testVariableLengthTS testSplittingCSVSequence
Edit: also these tests don't seem to be picking up the input files, when run using "mvn clean test -pl org.deeplearning4j:deeplearning4j-core" (running in intellij works ok though)

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
